about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Takazade is a platform where skills are valued and knowledge is freely shared.
about.missionText1: Takazade takes its name from the spirit of sharing of the past. We are bringing together the communal work and barter culture inherited from the Great Ottoman Empire with today's technology.
about.missionText2: Founded under the leadership of Mehmet Reşit Gül, Takazade is a modern community where people grow together by sharing their knowledge and talents.
about.visionDesc: We envision a world where everyone has equal access, skills flow freely and knowledge belongs to everyone.
about.communityDesc: Thousands of users with different skills come together at Takazade, learning from each other and sharing their experiences.
about.valuesDesc: Sharing, solidarity, equality and sustainability are our core values. We believe everyone is valuable.
about.sustainabilityDesc: We support a sustainable and eco-friendly approach not only in education but in all areas of life.
about.founderDesc: Mehmet Reşit Gül is the founder of Takazade. Having stepped into entrepreneurship at a young age, Gül brought Takazade to life with the aim of reviving the culture of sharing in the digital age. With this platform, where he combines the heritage spirit of communal work from the Ottoman Empire with modern technology, he aims for people to grow together by sharing their knowledge and talents.
about.joinDesc: Join the Takazade community to share your skills, learn new ones and contribute to a sustainable future.

privacy.section1Point2: Profile information (optionally entered skills, interests, etc.)

privacy.section1Point4: Credit card or payment information is not collected.
privacy.section2Intro: Collected information is used for the following purposes:
privacy.section2Point1: To create and personalize user profiles

privacy.section2Point4: To respond to feedback and support requests
privacy.section3Point1: Your user information is stored on secure servers.
